channel.title: Still can't connect?
channel.description:
OK, I've done private servers before, some might remember, but now no one can connect. i got rid of my router (linxus) because it was screwing up, and i just bought a switch. I wanted to play again,so I downloaded Gnarlyscape,made loads of edits to it, and when i asked a friend to connect, he said he can't. I followed everything in this tutorial http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,200036.0.html and nothing is working. i am using a westel modem, and my brother (being the fag he is) set his own username and password to it. i asked him for it and he didn't want to tell me. do i need to port forward when im directly into a modem? I had cox digital internet (many haven't heard of it) and it was working fine. now i have Verizon DSL and i can connect to other servers, but no one can connect to mine.
Please i need help. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 24, 2007, 12:43:25 AM[/size][hr]bumping.

item.title: Still can't connect?
item.dc:creator: @skatelifemanager skatelifemanager
item.description:
@skatelifemanager wrote:

OK, I’ve done private servers before, some might remember, but now no one can connect.
i got rid of my router (linxus) because it was screwing up, and i just bought a switch.
I wanted to play again,so I downloaded Gnarlyscape,made loads of edits to it, and when i asked
a friend to connect, he said he can’t. I followed everything in this tutorial
http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,200036.0.html
and nothing is working.
i am using a westel modem, and my brother (being the fag he is) set his own username and password to it.
i asked him for it and he didn’t want to tell me.
do i need to port forward when im directly into a modem?
I had cox digital internet (many haven’t heard of it) and it was working fine.
now i have Verizon DSL and i can connect to other servers, but no one can connect to mine.

Please i need help.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 24, 2007, 12:43:25 AM[/size][hr]bumping.
